Description: Marl pottery vase with flat base, convex sides, pull-up rim and everted lip (chipped), with two finger-pinched wavy handles on the shoulder; coated with buff-coloured slip. Body has warped in the firing process, making the orifice oval and the body irregular.
Curator's comments: Wavy-handled W19 in Petrie Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery (1921).
